sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container>
    <el-header>
      <el-container class="select-container">
        <el-select
          v-model="article.category"
          placeholder="选择文章类别"
          style="margin-right: 15px">
          <el-option
            v-for="item in categories"
            :key="item.value"
            :label="item.label"
            :value="item.value">
          </el-option>
        </el-select>
        <el-select
          v-model="article.tags"
          multiple
          filterable
          allow-create
          default-first-option
          placeholder="请选择文章标签">
          <el-option
            v-for="item in tags"
            :key="item.value"
            :label="item.label"
            :value="item.value">
          </el-option>
        </el-select>
      </el-container>
      <el-container>
        <el-input
          placeholder="请输入标题"
          v-model="article.title"
          clearable>
        </el-input>
      </el-container>
      <el-container>
        <el-input
          placeholder="请输入作者"
          v-model="article.author"
          clearable>
        </el-input>
      </el-container>
    </el-header>
    <el-main>
      <mavon-editor
        class="mavon"
        ref=md
        @imgAdd="imgAdd"
        @imgDel="imgDel"
        v-model="article.mdContent">
      </mavon-editor>
    </el-main>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'CreateArticle',
  data () {
    return {
      categories: [],
      tags: [],
      article: {
        title: '',
        author: '',
        category: '',
        tags: [],
        content: ''
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .select-container {
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }
  .el-input {
    width: 47%;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }
  .el-main {
    margin-top: 70px;
  }
  .mavon {
    height: 350px;
    width: 100%;
  }
</style>
